title: This $15 Anker power strip deal is too good to pass up
content:
Macworld

One of the things that’s essential to productivity is a clear desk, something this Anker power strip can definitely help with. Now only $14.79 at Amazon instead of its usual $26, this compact Anker Power Strip can charge up to six devices at once, including your MacBook and iPhone.

The Anker 321 power strip features three AC outlets you can use to plug in your laptop and extra monitor, as well as two USB-A ports and one USB-C port. These three USB ports can be super handy to plug in your iPhone, Apple Watch, and MacBook in case they all happen to need charging at the same time.

Since this is such a portable power strip, it will be perfect to take with you on trips, too – just so you can be sure you can charge all your devices once you find that elusive outlet in your hotel room. If you want to permanently make it part of your desktop setup, it has a five-foot cord and a unique cube design that can neatly fit on or under a desk.

The power strip features one 20W USB-C port that will help bring your iPhone and other mobile devices to a full battery much faster than your regular chargers, thus saving you time. The Anker power strip also comes with a built-in safety system with fire resistance, short circuit protection, and even circuit overload protection.

So, whatever you do, if you have $15 to spend today, get this $14.79 Anker power strip at Amazon and solve your charging needs.
